message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $9500. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering its value to you is $8000. I believe this price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while allowing you to secure it at a favorable rate.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $8500?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. Considering the value you place on the product, I propose a price of $8800. This offers a compromise between our positions and allows you to acquire the product at a price that reflects its value to you, while still ensuring a fair transaction for me.
